text:
Weigh station inspectors, even though given certain “general police
powers”, are not engaged in an activity within the traditional meaning of the
term “law enforcement activities” and therefore do not qualify for the Sec 7(k)
exemption.
html: Weigh station inspectors, even though given certain “general police powers”, are not engaged in an activity within the traditional meaning of the term “law enforcement activities” and therefore do not qualify for the Sec 7(k) exemption.
